item.title: 70. Climing Stairs
item.description: Solution: dp - top down Code: # Time Complexity: O(n) # Space Complexity: O(1) class Solution: def climbStairs(self, n: int) -> int: # DP: top-down # due to one step and two steps, # (n-2)th result depends on the result of n - 1, n # case n = 3, it's two way here, # two step: 1 -> -> 3 # one step: 1 -> 2 # initiate one step, two step as 1.
